title: Didn't get free win in promos
body: Recently reached promos to gold 5 lost then received the message that next time I reached them I would be granted a free win.  I Ended up qualifying for the series again, but was not awarded one.  Does the promo helper not apply in tier promotions?

replies.body: It's strange to hear that you didn't get a promo helper if you were eligible for it, so I checked things out for you.   I see you had lost a series on the 11th.  You got into another series and were promoted with a single game on the 12th.  Nothing seems out of the ordinary here.  Hope that helps with clearing things up!
Did you demote out of the division you were in?   That would reset any promo helpers you had.
